name: Demon Solider demo_1
description:
Specs:

A turn based strategy game
Independent Game
Platform & Interactive: PC(Mouse), Mobile (Touch Screen)
Develop: Unreal Engine 4, Photoshop, 3DS Max
Model Content ： Skeleton Crew Bundle from Unreal Store

Gameplay:

The main scene contains 5 characters, 1 character controlled by player (selected by the player in the Choosing Character  scene), and 4 AI Characters (Randomly selected 4 Character from the remaining 6 characters) Through RPS system and skills 5 characters fight till last man standing
